description: Deletes an Amazon CloudWatch log stream from an SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

parameters.name: CloudWatchLoggingOptionId
parameters.description: The CloudWatchLoggingOptionId of the Amazon CloudWatch logging option to delete. You can get the CloudWatchLoggingOptionId by using the  DescribeApplication operation.

nested_items.name: ApplicationVersionId
nested_items.description: The version ID of the application. Kinesis Data Analytics updates the ApplicationVersionId each time you change the CloudWatch logging options.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLoggingOptionDescriptions
nested_items.description: The descriptions of the remaining CloudWatch logging options for the application.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLoggingOptionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the CloudWatch logging option description.

nested_items.name: LogStreamARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch log to receive application messages.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: The IAM ARN of the role to use to send application messages.
